text: The Vibrators are a British punk rock band that formed in 1976. The band signed to Epic Records in early 1977. Their debut album, Pure Mania was co- produced with Robin Mayhew, the sound engineer for David Bowie's Ziggy Stardust live shows, and reached the top 50 of the UK Albums Chart. ==References== Category:1976 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:British rock bands Category:Musical groups from London Category:Musical groups established in 1976 Category:1970s British music groups Category:1980s British music groups Category:1990s British music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups
title: The Vibrators
